bio: Passionate about blockchain and the positive impact it can have on the globe.
contributionDescription:
I've made contributions that have enriched the Collective. One of the key ways I've added value is through my contribution to the Community Hub repository. I've dedicated my time and expertise to updating vital information that enhances the functionality and accessibility of developer resources.

Additionally, I've leveraged my skills to craft numerous Twitter threads, each designed to effectively raise awareness about the Collective's mission and impact.

contributionLinks.description: Fixed broken links, removed dated ones and added helpful resources in the docs
Wrote a thread about ways to contribute and earn with the Collective
Wrote a comprehensive thread on RetroPGF
Wrote a comprehensive thread highlighting the changes coming to Governance S5

impactDescription:
I have helped create more accurate documentation for our community members. Such change would lead to a less frustrating and smoother user experience for users and developers within the Collective.

Posting Twitter threads to raise awareness about the Collective has expanded our reach and visibility. These threads have acted as a powerful tool to inform, educate, and inspire a broader audience. They will attract new followers, supporters, and potential collaborators.
pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, User Experience & Adoption
